Invaders fans will absolutely love this; And non-fans too :)
A must have for any iPhone, iPod gamer. You will spend countless hours playing this.

THE STORY:
Hundreds of bugs have been sent to Outer Space for some human experiments.
The results of the experiment has not turned out to be what the humans expected.
AND.....
What happens when some bugs get trapped in space!
They learn the ways of the Galaxy Invaders and come back to earth for revenge as the BUG INVADERS.
It is now up to you to save the day.
Take control of the B-47 (bug destroyer) and exterminate all the incoming bugs.

FEATURES:
* Excellent graphics and atmosphere.
* Original Invaders animations featuring cute nasty bugs.
* Retro music and sounds.
* Galaxy Invaders retro feel but with mean bugs.
* Each bug species comes with its own AI.
* Many power-ups to help you in your galaxy adventure.
* Lite version only has 7 levels.
* Easy but always competitive.
* Online Leaderboards (are you the best bug exterminator!)

* Get the full version to unlock all levels. 50 Levels.
* No ads
* No annoying prompts
* And much more

CONTROL:
* Really simple controls.
* Just tilt your device to move your ship left or right.
* Touch anywhere on your screen to make your B-47 fighter shoot.

FUTURE PLANS:
* Next update will bring more levels
* More nasty bug species
* Other planets
* A possibility of intense 2 player action
* Any minor issues reported etc...
* And more things that might pop into my head :)

Buying Bug Invaders will support a developer who cares about his players.

Thanks.
